column1: * 1917 - J.R.R. Tolkiens leave of absence (to recover from his wikipedia:trench fever) ends
column2: but he is far from recovered.

column1: * 1928 - A New Glossary of the Dialect of the Huddersfield District
column2: containing a Foreword to A New Glossary of the Dialect of the Huddersfield District by J.R.R. Tolkien

column1: * 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to David Hicks.
* 1992 - The "International Tolkien Symposium" is held in wikipedia:Aachen
* 2009 - The Image of Man in C.S. Lewis is re-released.
** The Fellowship of the Ring defeated by Caradhras return to Eregion. They camp on a small hill and in the night are attacked by a pack of Wargs.Category:Dates
